question.text: How old were you when you had your first menstrual period?
Have you ever taken birth control pills (oral contraceptives) for one month or longer?
How many years in TOTAL have you used birth control pills?
Have you ever taken fertility drugs?
Have you ever been pregnant?
Were any of your pregnancies the result of taking fertility drugs?
Have you ever had a full-term pregnancy?
How many full-term pregnancies have you had? Please note that we will be asking about all other (not full-term) pregnancies in future questionnaires.
How old were you the first time you gave birth?
Are you currently pregnant or nursing?
Do you currently have menstrual periods?
In what year did you experience your last menstrual period?
Why did your periods stop?
Please specify the reason your period stopped:
Have you ever taken menopausal hormone therapy?
What formulation (types) of menopausal hormone therapy have you taken?
Have you ever had a surgery to remove part or all of your uterus?
In what year did you first experience your uterine surgery (hysterectomy)?
Have you ever had a surgery to remove part of an ovary or both ovaries?
In what year did you experience your last ovarian surgery (oophorectomy)?

data.error: ERROR: You must provide an answer for this question.

answer.text: I have never had a period
Yes, I used birth control pills in the past
Yes, I am currently using birth control pills
I have regular menstrual periods (I am premenopausal)
My menstrual periods are irregular but have not stopped
I no longer have regular menstrual periods (menopause)
My periods stopped because I had a surgery to remove my uterus (hysterectomy), but at least part of one ovary is intact
My periods stopped because I had a surgery to remove my uterus (hysterectomy), and both of my ovaries have been removed
My periods stopped because although I have a uterus, I had both of my ovaries removed
My periods stopped because of medication or chemotherapy
My periods stopped due to another reason
I don't know why my periods stopped
Yes, I have taken menopausal hormone therapy in the past, but no longer do
Yes, I am currently taking menopausal hormone therapy
No, I have never taken menopausal hormone therapy
I don't know whether I have taken menopausal hormone therapy
I have taken a combination pill with both estrogen and progestin
I have taken a combination pill with both estrogen and testosterone
I have taken estrogen and progestin as separate pills
I have taken bioidenticals or hormones from a compounding pharmacy
I don't know what formulation(s) of menopausal hormone therapy I used
Yes, I had a surgery to remove part of my uterus
Yes, I had a surgery to remove my entire uterus
No, I have never had a surgery to remove part or all of my uterus
Yes, I have had surgery to remove part of an ovary
Yes, I have had surgery to remove one ovary, but not both ovaries
Yes, I have had surgery to remove both ovaries
No, I have never had a surgery to remove any part of an ovary

xform:submission.xform:message: The form that you are working on either has incomplete questions or invalid data. This means that you have either not completed all mandatory questions or have entered invalid data into the form. Please recheck the form and make necessary changes before moving on. Please keep in mind that many of the text fields have restrictions. Read the question carefully to make sure you are aware of these restrictions.

The form that you are working on either has incomplete questions or invalid data. This means that you have either not completed all mandatory questions or have entered invalid data into the form. Please recheck the form and make necessary changes before moving on. Please keep in mind that many of the text fields have restrictions. Read the question carefully to make sure you are aware of these restrictions.

xform:output.xform:label: Please note we will be asking more detailed questions related to this topic in future questionnaires.

xform:output.value: 'Invalid data!'
